Dia Design Guild

  • View On GitHub

This project is maintained by DIADesignGuild

Partner Organizations

DIA works with a number of nonprofit and community organizations where they require assistance with operations and getting things done. Sometimes the work revolves around event and community design.

Not all UX projects are redesign projects. They may require sometime to identify and figure out the problems (discovery, requirement gathering, tech and UX assessment) before actual design and implementation.

Organizations we work with

  • Hack for LA, a Code for America brigade based in Los Angeles (Contact Grace or Bonnie Wolfe)
  • World Information Architecture Association (Contact Grace)
  • IAC: the information architecture conference (Contact Jessi)

Hosted on GitHub Pages using the Dinky theme
